title: Nepotism worst form of corruption
content:
Majority of the electorate in Nigeria voted for change and executed a ‘silent revolution’ in the March 28 Presidential election, which handed Muhammadu Buhari with the Nigerian presidency. It was a much needed revolution to halt the destabilising, dismembering, multi-furcating and cascading of a failing state into a vanishing country. Although the mantra of ‘change’ […]...
